# MakeInvoice.online - Free Invoice Generator

> MakeInvoice.online is a free online invoice generator that allows users to create professional PDF invoices instantly without signup.

## What This Tool Does
- Creates professional invoices in seconds
- Generates downloadable PDF invoices
- Calculates totals, taxes, and discounts automatically
- Supports multiple currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, and more)
- Works entirely in the browser - no data sent to servers
- No account or signup required

## Key Features
- Live invoice preview as you type
- Auto-save drafts (never lose your work)
- Save and reuse client information
- Save your business profile for future invoices
- Invoice history to track past invoices
- Custom logo upload (Premium)
- Multiple professional templates (Premium)

## How to Create an Invoice
1. Enter your business name, email, phone, and address
2. Enter your client's name, email, and address
3. Add line items with descriptions, quantities, and prices
4. Set tax rate and any discounts
5. Click "Download PDF" to get your invoice

## Pricing
- Free: Unlimited invoices, PDF download, basic features (includes small watermark)
- Premium ($3/month or $20/year): No watermark, custom logo, multiple currencies, premium templates

## Common Questions

Q: Is this invoice generator really free?
A: Yes, the basic invoice generator is completely free. Create unlimited invoices and download PDFs without paying.

Q: Do I need to create an account?
A: No account or signup required. Your data stays in your browser.

Q: What should I include on an invoice?
A: Business name/contact, client name/address, invoice number, date, due date, itemized services/products with prices, subtotal, tax, and total amount.

Q: What's the difference between an invoice and a receipt?
A: An invoice requests payment before it's made. A receipt confirms payment after it's received.

Q: What does Net 30 mean?
A: Net 30 means payment is due within 30 days of the invoice date.
